body_content.explanation: something that improves or increases something or makes it stronger:
examples: Vitamin D is believed to be an immune-system booster.
This whole idea is just a profit booster for drug companies.

body_content.explanation: a person who enthusiastically supports or promotes something (= tells people how good it is):
examples: I don't want to come across as a booster for any particular product.
The mayor and town boosters hope the new ballpark will be a catalyst for development.

body_content.explanation: a small amount of a substance that is given to increase the effect of the same substance that was given some time before, to continue to protect a person from illness:
an engine on a spacecraft that gives extra power for the first part of a flight:
